# Google Colab
.ipynb_checkpoints/
__pycache__/

# Mac/Windows hidden system files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Python cache
*.pyc

# Environment/config files
.env
*.env

# Token or secret files
*.key
*.secret

# Auto-generated summaries
*.summary.txt

# Output logs and temporary files
*.log
*.tmp

# Backup files
*~
